House Bill 3646

House Amendments ( html | pdf )
A-Engrossed ( html | pdf )
Enrolled ( html | pdf )
Introduced ( html | pdf )

HB 3646 By Representative FREDERICK; Representatives BAILEY, BARKER, BARTON, BUCKLEY, CLEM, DEMBROW, DOHERTY, GELSER, GREENLICK, HOLVEY, KAHL, MATTHEWS, READ, STIEGLER, WITT, Senators BATES, METSGER, SHIELDS (Presession filed.) -- Relating to public borrowing; and declaring an emergency.
02/01 (H) First reading. Referred to Speaker's desk.
02/01 (H) Referred to Revenue.
02/05 (H) Public Hearing and Work Session held.
02/10 (H) Recommendation: Do pass with amendments and be printed A-Engrossed.
02/11 (H) Second reading.
02/12 (H) Third reading. Carried by Frederick. Passed. Ayes, 59; Excused for Business of the House, 1--Berger.
02/15 (S) First reading. Referred to President's desk.
02/15 (S) Referred to Finance and Revenue.
02/17 (S) Public Hearing and Work Session held.
02/18 (S) Recommendation: Do pass the A-Eng. bill.
02/18 (S) Second reading.
02/19 (S) Carried over to 02-20 by unanimous consent.
02/20 (S) Third reading. Carried by Morse. Passed. Ayes, 29; excused, 1--Nelson.
02/23 (H) Speaker signed.
02/23 (S) President signed.
02/24 (H) Governor signed.
02/25 (H) Chapter 3, (2010 Laws): Effective date February 24, 2010.
